躡.definition: to walk on tiptoe; to walk quietly; to tread (on); to follow

躡機.definition: silk loom with a foot peddle

躡腳.definition: to walk cautiously in order not to make noise

躡腳根.definition: variant of 躡腳跟|蹑脚跟[nie4 jiao3 gen1]

躡腳跟.definition: to walk cautiously in order not to make noise

躡足.definition: to walk on tiptoe; to step on sb's foot; to join (a trade, profession etc); to associate with (a certain group of people)

躡跟.definition: too large or small for the feet (of shoes)

躡跡.definition: to follow sb's tracks; to tail

躡蹤.definition: to follow along behind sb (formal writing)
